      • autoPrintHeader

        public WriterOptions autoPrintHeader(boolean autoPrintHeader)
        When this is set to true, the addRecordEntry(column, value) will throw an exception. You must use addRecordEntry(value).
        Parameters:
        autoPrintHeader - the autoPrintHeader to set
